abstract: About 14 years after its initial release, Hotmail is getting revamped in a way that Microsoft claims will make people give it a try again.

lead_paragraph: At this point, Microsoft must have developed its own seminar for employees called something like Apologizing With Optimism: How to Persuade People to Give You Another Try.
